publicationStmt.publisher: Uppsala University, Department of linguistics and philology

msIdentifier.repository: Wroblewski Library of the Lithuanian Academy of Sciences in Vilniuse, Lithuania

msContents.summary: Translations of Biblical texts into North-Western Karaim: The Latter Prophets, The Twelve Minor Prophets, the Sifrei Emet (Psalms, Proverbs, Job), and the Five Megillot (Song of Songs, Ruth, Lamentations, Ecclesiastes, Esther)

ab.title: Hosea 1

l.foreign: דְבַר יְהֹוָה אֲשֶר הָיָה אֶל הוֹשֵעַ בֶן בְאֵרִי בִימֵי
עוּזִיָה יוֹתָם אָחָז יְחִזְקִיָה מַלְכֵי יְהוּדָה וּבִימֵי

ab.l: Śoźuń יוָ֘י -nyn ki ėdi Hošeaʿɣa uvluna B́eʾeriniń vaḥtynda ʿUzijanyn Jotamnyn ʾAḥaznyn Jiḥiźqijanyn bijĺariniń Juhudanyn da vaḥtynda Jaravaʿamnyn uvlunun Joʾašnyn bijiniń Jiśraʾeĺniń.
Bašlyḥtan śoźĺadi H Hošeaʿ byla da ajtty H Hošeaʿɣa barɣyn alɣyn öźuja azuvču qatyn da t́oŕasiń saja azuvču ulanlar ki azma azar ol jer artḥary H-dan.
Da bardy da aldy Goḿerni qyzyn Div́lajimniń da ḥamila boldu da t́oŕadi anar uvul.

Da ajtty H anar ataɣyn šemiń Jiźreʿeʾĺ ki hanuz az zamandan da saɣynyrmyn qanlaryn Jiźreʿeʾĺniń juv́u üśt́uńa Juhunun da saɣynyrmyn bijligiń juv́uńuń
Jiśraʾeĺniń.
Da bolur ol ḱuńd́a da syndyryrmyn kipligiń Jiśraʾeĺniń ėni- šińd́a Jiźreʿeʾĺniń.
Da ḥamila boldu hanuz da t́oŕadi qyz da ajtty anar ataɣyn šemiń anyn Lo Ruḥama ki arttyrmanmyn artyḥ raḥḿet́ĺaḿa juv́uń Jiśraʾeĺniń ki ėĺt́ḿa ėĺtirmiń dušmanny alarɣa.
Da juv́uń Juhudanyn raḥḿet́ĺarmiń da jarlyɣašlarmyn alarny H T́eńriĺari byla da jarlyɣašlamanmyn alarny jaj byla da qylyč byla da č́eriv́ byla atlar byla da jalan atlylar byla.
Da ömč́akt́ań ajyrdy Ruḥamany da ḥamila boldu da t́oŕadi uvul.
Da ajtty ataɣyn šemiń Lo ʿAmi ki siź t́uv́uĺ ulusum da ḿeń bolmammyn siźǵa bolušluḥqa.
